title: OPTC Tier List
description: This tier list provides a ranking of the best legends in One Piece Treasure Cruise (OPTC). The legends are ranked into S, A, B, and C tiers based on their overall power, versatility, and usefulness in various content.
heading: OPTC Tier List
introText: This tier list provides a ranking of the best legends in One Piece Treasure Cruise (OPTC). The legends are ranked into S, A, B, and C tiers based on their overall power, versatility, and usefulness in various content. This tier list is intended to be a general guideline and may not reflect the best team for every player. Factors such as playstyle, team composition, and the current content available in the game should also be considered when choosing a team.
